TEXT.TITLE: JORDAN, SUDAN SIGN 100 MLN DLR BARTER TRADE PACT
TEXT.BODY: Jordan and Sudan signed a barter trade agreement under which they will exchange 100 mln dlrs' worth of goods a year, Sudanese officials said. They said Sudan will export corn, sesame, peanuts, spices and cow hides, while Jordan will export cement, tomato puree, chemicals and pharmaceuticals. Reuter
